Nim

Class Pile

  • java.lang.Object
    • Nim.Pile

  • public class Pile
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates a pile of marbles for the game of Nim

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Pile()
      Constructs a pile of marbles such that the initial amount is anywhere from 10 to 100

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getPileSize()
      Gets the amount of marbles present in pile
      void removeMarbles(int amount)
      Removes the specified amount of marbles from the pile

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
